abstract: The company is accused of paying tens of millions of dollars to Omnicare in order put more patients on its blockbuster schizophrenia drug.
snippet: The company is accused of paying tens of millions of dollars to Omnicare in order put more patients on its blockbuster schizophrenia drug.
lead_paragraph: Johnson & Johnson paid kickbacks to the nation’s largest nursing home pharmacy to increase the number of elderly patients taking the antipsychotic Risperdal and several other medications, according to a complaint filed Friday by the office of the United States attorney in Boston.

headline.main: Johnson & Johnson Accused of Drug Kickbacks
headline.print_headline: Johnson & Johnson Is Accused of Paying Kickbacks
